properties.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Central Columbia River Gorge
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:24AM PST until January 18 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches.

* WHERE...In Washington and Oregon, Central Columbia River Gorge.

* WHEN...Until noon PST today.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may be mixed with rain at times. There
is a chance of freezing rain this morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY
